column1: Funeral services will be held at 11:00 a.m. on Friday
column3: 2015 at the Mount Olive First United Methodist Church for Martha Gertrude McRaney
column6: who passed peacefully during the mid-morning hour of Wednesday
column8: 2015.  Visitation will be held from 6:00 p.m. until 8:00 p.m. on Thursday
column10: 2015 at the Billy M. King-Colonial Chapel Funeral Home in Collins. She will also lie in state at the church from 10:00 a.m. until service time on Friday
